issue.title: [C++] Draft initial public APIs for Datasets project
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5512](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5512). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The objective of this is to ensure general alignment with the discussion document

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1bVhzifD38qDypnSjtf8exvpP3sSB5x_Kw9m-n66FB2c/edit?usp=sharing

so that an initial working implementation can begin to take place
